apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices portrays two men sharing a kiss, with both figures rendered in medium-dark and dark skin tones respectively, showcasing Apple's commitment to diverse representation with exquisite detail. The design features Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges, giving the embrace a warm and intimate feel. Itâ€™s a beautiful and direct way to express romantic love and partnership between men in digital communication on Apple devices.
